content: 99.co Event Investments REITs Property Asked by Teo JunyuanAsked on 25 May 2019Why choose property if reits can deliver better returns with less capital requirements?REITs vs Property1 answerAnswerBump1

Douglas Chow, Chief Enlightenment Officer at Empower AdvisoryLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 26 May 2019Hi Junyuan, Douglas here. 2nd keynote speaker.Reits are fine. U just have to be selective too. Not all reits perform and some do pretty badly like ESR Reit and AIMS AMP. Analyse a reit just like any stock, understand the assets they own and manage and the risk these assets face. Time your entry in and out the best you can. All the best.​​​
You can always connect with me via https://www.facebook.com/douglas.chow.908 or simply whatsapp/sms my company 24/7 hotline @83324283
Remember, plan your finances properly, don’t overstretch, do your homework and enjoy your property investment journey.
Regards
